Chantel Lysette did not grow up believing in angels, so when archangels first appeared to her and engaged her in conversation, she thought she was losing her mind. That was nearly twenty years ago, and today, she canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t imagine life without them.

Journey with this rebellious angel medium as she goes kicking and screaming to her destiny and discovers the surprising relationship between humans and the benevolent hosts of heaven. From pre-life planning and birth through the traumas, losses, and joys of life to the moment a soul returns to heaven, archangels walk with us every step of the way.

Our older siblings in spirit, these heavenly guardians are entrusted to teach and guide us. And while theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re not here to do our work for us, we can find peace in day-to-day living and fulfill our purpose for this lifetime when we learn to embrace the archangels.
